H0.text: Wind, oil, and coal are the group that contains only renewable resources found in Maryland.

H1.text: Fish, coal, wind is the group that contains only renewable resources found in Maryland, given that Maryland has many renewable and nonrenewable natural resources.

H2.text: Oil, water, and trees are the renewable resources found in Maryland that the group contains only renewable resources.

H3.text: Trees, water, and fish are the group that contains only renewable resources found in Maryland.

A4.text: Maryland has commercial fishing centered in the Chesapeake Bay, including blue crab, oysters, striped bass, and menhaden.

A5.text: Maryland has oak forests and pine groves, which are renewable resources.
